meanings.meaning: 1. pressure; force See also 圧力

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to push; to thrust; to shove シャッターを押してくれますか。Could you press this button?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to press (down); to push (e.g. a button); to exert pressure on also written as 圧す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to stamp (e.g. one's name); to affix (a seal) also written as 捺すその箱には製造者の証印が押してある。The box bears the stamp of the manufacturer.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to affix (e.g. gold leaf)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to push (someone for something); to press; to put pressure on (someone)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to overwhelm; to overpower; to put (someone) under pressure; to be superior to usu. in the passive; also written as 圧す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to push ahead (with a policy, plan, etc.); to proceed; to stick to

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to do ... in spite of ...; to defy; to brave; to push aside as ...を押して...

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to make sure See also 念を押す

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to fall behind schedule

meanings.meaning: 1. compression その気体は圧縮されてボンベに詰め込まれた。The gas was compressed into a gas cylinder.
2. condensing; shortening; summarizing
3. compression (of data) Computing, Antonym: 解凍圧縮したファイルを添付で送ってください。Send it to me as a compressed file.
4. Compression
1. compression その気体は圧縮されてボンベに詰め込まれた。The gas was compressed into a gas cylinder.
2. condensing; shortening; summarizing
3. compression (of data) Computing, Antonym: 解凍圧縮したファイルを添付で送ってください。Send it to me as a compressed file.
4. Compression

sentences.translation: The gas was compressed into a gas cylinder.
Send it to me as a compressed file.

meanings.meaning: 1. pressure; stress Physics橋が圧力で落ちた。The bridge crashed under the pressure.
2. pressure (e.g. political); coercion; arm-twisting その計画は世論の圧力で中止になった。The plan was given up under the pressure of public opinion.
3. Pressure Pressure is the force per unit area applied in a directio... Read more
1. pressure; stress Physics橋が圧力で落ちた。The bridge crashed under the pressure.
2. pressure (e.g. political); coercion; arm-twisting その計画は世論の圧力で中止になった。The plan was given up under the pressure of public opinion.
3. Pressure Pressure is the force per unit area applied in a directio... Read more

sentences.translation: The bridge crashed under the pressure.
The plan was given up under the pressure of public opinion.

meanings.meaning: 1. to pin down; to hold down; to press down; to hold in place; to hold steady also written as 圧さえるこのはしごをしっかり押さえてくれ。Hold this ladder steady.
2. to cover (esp. a part of one's body with one's hand); to clutch (a body part in pain); to press (a body part)
3. to get a hold of; to obtain; to seize; to catch; to arrest 警察はその強盗の首を押さえた。The police seized the robber by the neck.
4. to grasp (a point); to comprehend 私は彼が私の悪口を言っているところを押さえた。I caught him speaking ill of me.
5. to quell; to subdue; to suppress; to repress; to hold back; to check; to curb; to contain See also 抑える おさえる
押える 【おさえる】
1. to pin down; to hold down; to press down; to hold in place; to hold steady also written as 圧さえるこのはしごをしっかり押さえてくれ。Hold this ladder steady.
2. to cover (esp. a part of one's body with one's hand); to clutch (a body part in pain); to press (a body part)
3. to get a hold of; to obtain; to seize; to catch; to arrest 警察はその強盗の首を押さえた。The police seized the robber by the neck.
4. to grasp (a point); to comprehend 私は彼が私の悪口を言っているところを押さえた。I caught him speaking ill of me.
5. to quell; to subdue; to suppress; to repress; to hold back; to check; to curb; to contain See also 抑える おさえる
押える 【おさえる】

sentences.translation: The police seized the robber by the neck.
I caught him speaking ill of me.

meanings.meaning: 1. pressure
2. oppression; suppression
1. pressure
2. oppression; suppression
1. push; pushing あなたはボタンを押しさえすればいい。All you have to do is press the button.
2. weight; pressure
3. authority; forcefulness; boldness; audacity; persistence 君は押しが足りない。You don't have enough push.
4. to forcibly ...; to strongly ... Only applies to 押し, before a verb
圧し 【おし】
1. push; pushing あなたはボタンを押しさえすればいい。All you have to do is press the button.
2. weight; pressure
3. authority; forcefulness; boldness; audacity; persistence 君は押しが足りない。You don't have enough push.
4. to forcibly ...; to strongly ... Only applies to 押し, before a verb
圧し 【おし】

sentences.translation: All you have to do is press the button.

1. oppressive rule; tyrannical regime; despotism 地球側の圧政に苦しむコロニーの人々の中で、テロによる現状打破を目論む勢力が誕生。Among the people of the colonies suffering under Earth's tyranny a force emerges intending to overthrow the status quo through terrorism.
